description: Wannan yarinyar mai shekaru 17 ta sami Kyautar Zaman Lafiya ta Nobel!
title: “’Ya mace ba a yi ta domin ta zama ‘baiwa ba’ “
content:
Malala Yousafzai ‘yar Pakistan ta ajiye tarihi lokacin da ta zama ƙaramar yarinya ta farko da ta sami Kyautar Zaman Lafiya ta Nobel ta na ‘yar shekara 17. Kwamatin Nobel ya ce Malala ta nuna misali cewa mutane matasa su ma za su iya bayar da gudun mawa domin inganta matsayinsu. Sun kwatantata a matsayin shugaba wajen magana domin haƙƙin ‘ya’ya mata ga ilimi.
Malala ta na ‘yar shekara 11 kawai lokacin da ta fara magana domin haƙƙin ‘ya mace wajen ilimi, ta shaidawa taron ‘yan jarida a 2008. “Don me Taliban za su cire min tushen damata ta samun ilimi?”
Kalmominta ababen yabawa ne, ba kawai domin fitowarsu sarari da fasaharsu ba, amma domin rashin tsoronsu. Yanzu, duk da yinƙurin kasheta da bai yi nasara ba daga waɗanda ke son rufe bakinta, rashin tsoron Malala yana ƙara ƙarfi da kuma dagewa fiye da da.
“Wannan ƙarfafa gwiwa ne gareni in ci gaba kuma in yi imani da kaina – in san cewa akwai mutane masu goyon bayana a wannan wayar da kai. Muna tsaye tare.”
Malala ta godewa mahaifinta sabo da samun nasara, ta ce taimakonsa shi ya kawo duk bambance bambancen: “Ina godiya ga mahaifina da bai kalmashe fuka-fukaina ba; da ya ƙyaleni na tashi kuma na cimma burina. Domin nunawa duniya cewa ‘ya mace bai kamata ta zama ‘baiwa’ ba. ‘Ya mace na da ƙarfi ta sami ci gaba a rayuwarta.”
Mahaifin Malala Ziauddin Yousafzai ya ce yana fata sanarwar za ta taimakawa ‘yancin ‘yan mata a ko ina.
Yanar gizo ta zama wani wuri na hada-hada lokacin da aka sanar da samun nasarar Malala, inda fitattun mutane, ‘yan siyasa da shugabannin duniya suka dinga aikawa da saƙwannin murna ta twitter.
Swat Valley na Pakistan, inda Malala ta girma ya ɓarke da bukunkuna lokacin da ɗaliban makarantar da aka harbi Malala, suka fara antayowa daga ajujuwa domin rawa a tituna.
Shiga fafutukar Malala domin ilimin ‘ya mace: Karanta Shelar ‘Yan Mata, ki gasgata shi kuma ki bar shi – kuma ki shaidawa ƙawayenki domin yin haka!
 
[Haɗi zuwa Shelar ‘Yan Mata]
